DreamPackage

Class ScoringPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • DreamPackage.ScoringPolicy

  • public class ScoringPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
    ScoringPolicy is a class which checks and assign score according to special rules.
    Author:
    macbook
